Project Description
This is a project to help you get started in writing WPF applications for the Kinect sensor.

Months ago, when the beta version of the Kinect SDK was released, I had read an article(http://www.diaryofaninja.com/blog/2011/10/19/remaking-the-xbox-kinect-hub--an-introduction-to-new-user-intErfaces). This provided a way of using your hand to invoke button click handlers just like in the Xbox Kinect Hub. But since the Kinect SDK got updated to v1.0(and subsequently to v1.5), I did not find any updated version. So, I went ahead and created this project.

It uses the Hoverbutton control of the Coding4Fun Kinect Toolkit.
Read more about it on my blog:http://sandreddy.wordpress.com/2012/07/12/kinect-button/
